name: Real-Time Location Tracker
description: Display and track location on an interactive map. Use Glide's 'Starting Point' column to get coordinates, or pass latitude/longitude directly. Shows location on OpenStreetMap - no API keys required! Add a web-embed component to your layout, then select this column as the source. by @xaviigna
author: xaviigna

params.name: latitude
params.displayName: Latitude (optional - if not using Starting Point)

params.name: longitude
params.displayName: Longitude (optional - if not using Starting Point)
